server.created: A new Server is created with identifier {{ param }}
server.updated: A Server is updated with identifier {{ param }}
server.deleted: A Server is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Server {{ id }}?

server.question1: What type of Servers Does your organization have? (On-Premise Servers, Cloud-based Servers, Hybrid Infrastructure)
server.question2: Data Storage Location (e.g.: Local, Servers, Cloud Storage)
server.question3: What is the estimated age of the server's hardware
server.question4: What kind of alerts do you receive and how are they handled?
server.question5: What operating systems are predominantly used on your servers? (e.g., Windows Server, Linux distributions, other)
server.question6: Do you have a system for monitoring server performance and health
server.question7: Do you have a disaster recovery plan in place for server outages or failures
